mission: Marvel Comics tragedy: THRONE PANEL! Peres finally sits, but 'ACTING PM' floats mockingly above! Tries lifting peace hammer - ALMOST worthy! STRAIN LINES! Operation Grapes panels: MISSILES EVERYWHERE! 'What have I done?!' Qana disaster: SCARLET WITCH-level accident! HORROR! Election battle: BIBI vs PERES! Epic clash panels! '1% MARGIN!' So close! CRUSHING DEFEAT! Lifetime montage panels: Always the bridesmaid. 'MR. PEACE' becomes 'President of... Nothing.' Final panel: Age 93, arc reactor dims... still dreaming. Editor's note: 'The Eternal Runner-Up Rests.'

script_processing.original_script: The throne awaits, finally Peres sits. But 'Acting PM' mocks his every move. He reaches for the hammer, almost worthy. Strain lines erupt from his effort. Operation Grapes explodes into a nightmare. Missiles rain down, uncontrollable. What have I done? The Qana disaster unfolds, a scarlet witch-level accident. Horror. The election battle rages. Bibi and Peres face off in an epic clash. A one percent margin! So unbelievably close. A crushing defeat is delivered. Always the bridesmaid. Mr. Peace becomes President of... Nothing at all. Age ninety-three. His arc reactor dims. Still dreaming of what could have been.
script_processing.final_script: The throne awaits; Peres finally sits.  But the 'Acting PM' title mocks his every move. He reaches for the gavel, a weighty symbol of power, strain etched deep on his face. Operation Grapes erupts, a nightmare of missiles raining down uncontrollably.  What have I done? The Qana disaster unfolds, a catastrophic accident.  Horror grips the nation.  The election battle rages; Bibi and Peres clash. A razor-thin margin of one percent!  An agonizingly close defeat. Always the bridesmaid, never the bride.  Mr. Peace becomes President of… nothing at all.  At ninety-three, his dreams dim, a legacy unfulfilled.
